abstract: Now that the board has ousted Home Depot’s chairman and chief executive, Robert L. Nardelli, shareholders are expecting big changes at the home improvement retailing giant.
snippet: Now that the board has ousted Home Depot’s chairman and chief executive, Robert L. Nardelli, shareholders are expecting big changes at the home improvement retailing giant.
lead_paragraph: Now that the board has ousted Home Depot’s chairman and chief executive, Robert L. Nardelli, shareholders are expecting big changes at the home improvement retailing giant.

headline.main: Home Depot Board Faces New Outcry
headline.print_headline: Home Depot Board Faces New Outcry

abstract: Home Depot‘s ousted chairman and chief executive, Robert L. Nardelli, may not be the only one to walk the plank at the home improvement retailing giant. Some shareholder activists and corporate governance watchdogs are now turning their attention to the company’s board, criticizing Home Depot’s decision to allow three directors to remain even after reaching the mandatory retirement age of 72.
lead_paragraph: Home Depot‘s ousted chairman and chief executive, Robert L. Nardelli, may not be the only one to walk the plank at the home improvement retailing giant. Some shareholder activists and corporate governance watchdogs are now turning their attention to the company’s board, criticizing Home Depot’s decision to allow three directors to remain even after reaching the mandatory retirement age of 72.

headline.main: Home Depot Board Faces New Outcry
